courseName: Applied Ecology (Postgraduate Certificate / Postgraduate Diploma / MSc)
facultyName: School of Natural, Social and Sport Sciences
description: What is Applied Ecology?On this course you’ll gain the knowledge and skills you need for a career in practical ecology and conservation – we have a highly practical emphasis with hands-on exercises in field and laboratory being embedded throughout the course
fees: FeesPlease see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
